data.name: CustomViewEventPage.Help
data.value: When disabled, event details are displayed within this module, you can optionally choose to display event details in a dedicated DNN page which includes FXE-EventDetails module.

data.name: ViewEventPage.Help
data.value: Navigate to this page to view event details, FXE-EventDetails module must be placed on this page

data.name: AllowReviews.Help
data.value: Whether to accept reviews for all events

data.name: ReviewNeedApproval.Help
data.value: Reviews will only be displayed after approval when this option is enabled, this option is ignored if the author has add permission in this module.

data.name: ViewPermission.Help
data.value: In default, all events are visible to users who can view this page, you can optionally turn on view permission to set who can view a event

data.name: AddEventRoles.Help
data.value: User roles who can add events to this module, edit their own events and reviews posted to them.

data.name: ShareLocations.Help
data.value: For users with add event permission, this option allows them to see and use locations added by other users.

data.name: ManageRoles.Help
data.value: User roles who can manage all events and reviews in this module.

data.name: BookingOpens.Help
data.value: Number of days users can book a event before it happens, set it to 0 if users can book a event at any time

data.name: Currency.Help
data.value: The currency to be used for online booking

data.name: ListView.Help
data.value: The default list view of this module

data.name: MapViewHeight.Help
data.value: The width of the map view fits to its container, while the height can be customized

data.name: SalesTax.Help
data.value: Whether to collect sales tax, choose Home State Only if you wish to collect tax only from users of specefic state.

data.name: HomeCountry.Help
data.value: The country of users to collect tax from

data.name: HomeState.Help
data.value: The state of users to collect tax from

data.name: TaxRate.Help
data.value: The tax rate to be collected

data.name: MerchantHash.Help
data.value: Authorize.Net Merchant Hash, please ensure you apply same value to Authorized.Net account settings page

data.name: ManualPayment.Help
data.value: Accept manual payment, you are responsible to collect payments and manually change payment status

data.name: PaymentInstructions.Help
data.value: The instructions for users who choose to pay manually

data.name: PageSizeRequired.Text
data.value: List View Page Size is required

data.name: PageSizeInvalid.Text
data.value: List View Page Size is invalid

data.name: AddMetadata.Help
data.value: When enabled, users with add event permission can add new categories and locations. Users with manage permission are not affected by this option.

data.name: ShowRegistrationTab.Help
data.value: When a user add event without manage permission, this option dictates whether to show the registration tab. Users with manage permission are not affected by this option.

data.name: EventModules.Help
data.value: Choose event modules you wish to link as sub calendars of this module.

data.name: ParentCalendar.Help
data.value: The parent calendar of this module.

data.name: MaxCategories.Help
data.value: The maximum number of categories an event belongs to

data.name: FriendlyURL.Help
data.value: Use friendly URL for event detail page

data.name: TurnOffBeforeUninstallation.Text
data.value: Please remember to turn off this option before uninstalling Flex Events

data.name: MonthFilter.Help
data.value: Filter events by month. All events will be displayed if disabled
